Package xxl.io

Provides for system input and output through data streams, serialization and the file system.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Convertable The interface Convertable is a replacement for the SDK Externalizable interface because of its drawbacks.
 

Class Summary
Block This class provides a block of serialized data.
BlockBasedQueue This class provides a queue that uses a container for storing blocks of serialized data.
BlockFactory This class provides a block factory, i.e.
BlockFileContainer This class provides a container that is able to store blocks in a file.
BooleanArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of boolean values.
BooleanConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Boolean objects.
Buffer This class provides a buffer for buffering I/Os in order to increase performance.
BufferedContainer This class wraps a container by buffering its elements in a given buffer.
BufferedOutputStream This class wraps an output stream by writing whole blocks of buffered output bytes to the wrapped output stream.
BufferedRandomAccessFile This class provides a buffered random access file that reads and writes whole blocks of buffered bytes to and from the random access file.
ByteArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of byte values.
ByteConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Byte objects.
CharacterArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of char values.
CharacterConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Character objects.
ConvertableConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write objects that implements the Convertable interface.
Converter The class Converter is used for serializing objects that cannot implement the Convertable interface (e.g., predefined classes of the SDK).
ConverterContainer This class provides a container that stores a set of converted elements.
Converters This class contains various methods connected to the serialization of objects.
DoubleArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of double values.
DoubleConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Double objects.
FileInputIterator This class provides an iterator that depends on a given file.
FileStackQueue This class provides an implementation of the Queue interface with a LIFO (last in, first out) strategy that internally uses a file for storing its elements.
FloatArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of float values.
FloatConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Float objects.
InputIterator This class provides an iterator that depends on a data input stream.
IntegerArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of int values.
IntegerConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Integer objects.
IOCounter This class provides a simple utility for counting I/Os.
IteratorInputStream This class provides an input stream that depends on a given iterator.
ListStreamQueue This class provides a stream queue that stores the bytes of its serialized elements in a ListQueue.
LongArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of long values.
LongConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Long objects.
LRUBuffer This class provides a buffer with a LRU (least recently used) displacement strategy.
MultiBlockContainer This class provides a container that is able to store logical blocks whose whose size is a multiple of blockSize in a file.
ObjectArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of Objects.
RandomAccessFileQueue This class provides a stream queue that stores the bytes of its serialized elements in a random access file.
SerializableConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write objects that implements the Serializable interface.
ShortArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of short values.
ShortConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write Short objects.
StreamQueue This class provides a queue that uses a data input stream and a data output stream to store its elements.
StringArrayConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write arrays of String objects.
StringBufferConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write StringBuffer objects.
StringConverter This class provides a converter that is able to read and write String objects.
UniformConverter This class provides a wrapper for a converter that reads and writes uniform objects.
URLInputIterator This class provides an iterator that depends on a given URL.
 

Package xxl.io Description

Provides for system input and output through data streams, serialization and the file system. An alternatively serialization mechanism is included by defining Converter and the Convertable interface. Last but not least, this package contains a Buffer implementation for the buffering of I/Os and a Block implementation for block based I/Os.
This package provides a larger collection of converters, e.g. a complete collection of converters for the primitive data types, strings and arrays of these types. A larger bundle of buffered and unbuffered collections that uses external resources for storing their elements is also included. Of course, every collection supports a close method that releases any system resources associated with the collection.
